text: Third parties with whom we partner to provide certain features on our site or to display advertising based upon your Web browsing activity use LSOs such as HTML 5 to collect and store information.

The purposes for which we may disclose your Personal Information or data to our service providers may include, but are not limited to, data storage, database management, web analytics and payment processing.
These service providers are authorized to use your Personal Information or data only as necessary to provide these services to us.

data_type: third party personal information provide as part of
text: Vymo will have access to third party Personal Information provided by you as part of using Vymo Services such as contacts in your Vymo account.

For example, we retain your transaction history so that you can review past purchases (and repeat orders if desired) and what addresses you have shipped orders to, and to improve the relevance of products and content we recommend.

Due to the communications standards on the internet, when you use the Software, we will automatically receive the uniform resource locator (URL) of the site from which you came and the site to which you are going when you leave the Software.
